works.complaint:
a.	The site states:"I can not believe how stupid I was
 
to become involved with this bunch of cowboys"

"These scaming cowboys even try to cover their own tracks in forums and  
places as seen here"

"sells a scam ridden product"


b.	The text states Regent Markets Pty Ltd is a scam, sells a scam product,
 
and are "scaming cowboys".

At no point have I been involved in the operation of a scam, and the
Regent  
Markets Pty Ltd is not a scam. I have never been charged or convicted of  
any dishonesty offence. I would not employ people who have been charged or
 
convicted of any dishonesty offence.

Regent Markets is a small business with less than 10 employees.

c.	These comments harm my reputation in and cause damage to my business.  
The publishers and distributors of this material would be liable for civil
 
damages under the Defamation Act 2005 (Qld). Due to the possible  
retaliation, and threat to my safety caused by that the claims that in am 

engaged in criminal enterprises, the comments violate Criminal defamation 

sections of Criminal Code Act 1899 (Qld).
